name: Osai Vultures

Flying

flavor_text: A sign of battle, the Vultures circle and wait for the victorious to depart.

oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't attack.

Enchant creature

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike

Flying

name: Su-Chi
oracle_text: When Su-Chi dies, add {C}{C}{C}{C}.

oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though Mishra was impressed by the staves Ashnod had created for Zegon's defense, he understood they only hinted at her full potential.

Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

name: Rakalite
oracle_text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Return Rakalite to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Urza was the first to understand that the war would not be lost for lack of power, but for lack of troops.

name: Ornithopter
oracle_text: Flying

name: Onulet
oracle_text: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

name: Obelisk of Undoing
oracle_text: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you both own and control to your hand.

name: Mishra's War Machine
oracle_text:
Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. name: Millstone
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

name: Mightstone
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0.
flavor_text: While exploring the sacred cave of Koilos with his brother Mishra and their master Tocasia, Urza fell behind in the Hall of Tagsin, where he discovered the remarkable Mightstone.

name: Jalum Tome
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

name: Grapeshot Catapult
oracle_text: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

name: Golgothian Sylex

name: Feldon's Cane

name: Dragon Engine

oracle_text:
As Cursed Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.

{9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

Flying

name: Clay Statue

name: Ashnod's Altar

name: Amulet of Kroog
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
